#Build libqq-pidgin by emerge

= Introduction =
  This is a guide to build libqq-pidgin for pidgin in gentoo

= Details =

==First , add libqq-pidgin's overlay==

[http://libqq-pidgin.googlecode.com/svn/portage/]

{{{
svn co http://libqq-pidgin.googlecode.com/svn/portage/ /var/lib/libqq-pidgin
vim /etc/make.conf
}}}

append
{{{
PORTDIR_OVERLAY="
$PORTDIR_OVERLAY
/var/lib/libqq-pidgin
"
}}}

==Then` USE="-qq" emerge pidgin-qq2010 -av `==

=2nd way, full pidgin rebuild, see here=

Add libqq-pidgin overlay as described above.

Execute
{{{
USE=qq emerge pidgin-2.7.10-r69
}}} 

This will cause libqq-pidgin of r69 version replace pidgin's qq, then do a full rebuild of pidgin.

Enjoin you self ;)
